title: Myriad Pro & Myriad Apple
content:
Dears:

I received an Pdf file which use Myriad Apple That font is an OTF But my Mac os 10 has Myriad pro in the Adobe supporting font only is there any information about that Myriad (apple) and is there a way to make my Pdf change that Myriad Apple to Myriad pro WhichI have already in my equipment ?

Thank you
author: Safwat

comments.content: If you are an Apple employee or partner you should have access to the Myriad Apple font.
I'm sure there are PDF hacking tools out there, but what's the benefit of using resident fonts rather than those embedded in the PDF?
